Necromancer/Hell Drak

	Necromancer looked at Hell Drak for a second, with a sneer.  Then he
turned towards Dinobot.  Hell Drak listened to Dinobot's words closely,
then spoke.

	"Woa, sorry!  I didn't know you Maximals were such babies!" She hollered
out.

	Necromancer looked at his sister again, this time with a seriously angry
expression.

	"Sister!!!  That's enough!!!  You heard what he said, show some respect! 
After all, we came here to help the Maximals, not mistreat them!" He turned
to Dinobot, with less tension, "Sorry, about that.  Please forgive her.  I
know forgiving her may be hard, but really, she's ok.  Anyway, you asked
about our qualifications eh?  Well, we said we're elites, and we wouldn't
lie," Necromancer looked at Hell Drak, "Well, at least I wouldn't lie to
you.  I will show you some of my skills on those two trees over there,"
Necromancer said and pulled out his laser disc shooter. 

	He fired a fairly large laser disc at the first tree, and then it sliced
right through the tree, making the big piece of it fall down in between the
two trees.  Then Necromancer fired a disc at the other tree, and it fell on
top of the other tree.  

	"I give you the honor of finishing them off, sister," Necromancer said,
looking towards Hell Drak.

	"Allright, brother.  Very well then!!" Hell Drak said as she ran over to
the trees.  The stood in front of the two piled trees, lifted her foot up,
and stomped it down, right through them!!!!!!!!!!!!

	Necromancer walked back up near Dinobot, "How's that??  Also, we assure
you that in a real battle, we aren't so merciless towards other bots,"
Necromancer turned to look at Hell Drak, but this time didn't say "At least
I'm not so merciless" because Hell Drak was standing right there.
